EmailTemplate.subject: Use & Care guidelines (case: {!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir, Madam,
In reference to your complaint {!Case.CaseNumber} dated {!Case.Date_Entered__c}, we send you hereby our Use & Care booklet.
Most of our Use & Care guidelines, you probably already follow instinctively, but if you have any questions, please contact us.
In case you would like to refresh your counter top, we can provide you with the details of a service center or a list of QN fabricators nearby, who can provide you with a price offer.
Friendly Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} DuPont Building Innovations QN & Warranty Assistant {!Case.OwnerPhone} Email: BI-Warranty@dupont.com www.corian.com
